trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller argument som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> base constructor.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>-objekt som representerar ett nytt aktuella inmatningsspråk.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the initiated change of input language should be accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om initierade ändringen av inmatningsspråk ska godkännas eller avvisas.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> event is raised when a change in input language has been initiated, but not completed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>händelsen utlöses när en ändring i inmatningsspråk har initierats men inte slutförts.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>

trans-unit.source: **true** to reject the initiated change of input language; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **SANT** att avvisa initierade ändringen av inmatningsspråk; annars **FALSKT**.
